allow:
Bash(echo "1133,MAGMABALL,Magma Ball,3,1000,A Poké Ball for catching Rock- and Fire-type Pokémon. Also works on trapped Pokémon or those with a status condition.,0,2,4,
1134,STORMBALL,Storm Ball,3,1000,A Poké Ball for catching Electric- and Flying-type Pokémon. Also works on trapped Pokémon or those with a status condition.,0,2,4,
1135,HEXBALL,Hex Ball,3,1000,A Poké Ball for catching Ghost- and Poison-type Pokémon. Also works on trapped Pokémon or those with a status condition.,0,2,4,
1136,TERRABALL,Terra Ball,3,1000,A Poké Ball for catching Grass- and Ground-type Pokémon. Also works on trapped Pokémon or those with a status condition.,0,2,4,
1137,ENIGMABALL,Enigma Ball,3,1000,A Poké Ball for catching Dragon- and Psychic-type Pokémon. Also works on trapped Pokémon or those with a status condition.,0,2,4,
1138,BRAWLBALL,Brawl Ball,3,1000,A Poké Ball for catching Normal- and Fighting-type Pokémon. Also works on trapped Pokémon or those with a status condition.,0,2,4,
1139,MIRRORBALL,Mirror Ball,3,1000,A Poké Ball for catching Steel- and Ice-type Pokémon. Also works on trapped Pokémon or those with a status condition.,0,2,4,
1140,FEATHERBALL,Feather Ball,3,300,A Poké Ball for catching Pokémon weighing 500 or less. Also works on trapped Pokémon or those with a status condition.,0,2,4,
1141,APEXBALL,Apex Ball,3,300,A Poké Ball for catching Pokémon with height 200 or more. Also works on trapped Pokémon or those with a status condition.,0,2,4,
1142,POCKETBALL,Pocket Ball,3,300,A Poké Ball for catching Pokémon with height 50 or less. Also works on trapped Pokémon or those with a status condition.,0,2,4,
1143,VIRUSBALL,Virus Ball,3,1000,A Ball that gives caught Pokémon Pokérus. Works when target is below 50% HP or is trapped/has a status condition.,0,2,4,
1144,BANDITBALL,Bandit Ball,3,300,A Ball that grants 100 Poké Dollars when catching. Works when target is below 50% HP or is trapped/has a status condition.,0,2,4,")
